pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides an Interface to the Agent-Based Modelling Platform 'NetLogo' // Interface to use and access Wilensky's 'NetLogo' (Wilensky 1999) from R using either headless (no GUI) or interactive GUI mode. Provides functions to load models, execute commands, and get values from reporters. Mostly analogous to the 'NetLogo' 'Mathematica' Link https://github.com/NetLogo/Mathematica-Link.
